CHAT.comment: Playing with toys in school room with experimenter off to side
St. Stanislaus Public School , Guelph , Ont. , Canada.
Toys on 4 x 5 carpet , playdoh; dollhouse with bear figures and furniture; large stuffed bear; construction vehicles , figures and tools; mechano type set.
Jacqueline A. Caldwell for Mary Ann Evans

u.a: holds up playdoh and pulls in apart .
turns head and looks at Col-s dough .
holds up piece of toy furniture .
shows a big slab of playdo .
reaches pest Col and picks up playdoh .
shows Gil how to cut out playdoh .
